document.full_text: syrian president bashar al-assad issued a general amnesty on tuesday, state television said, after ten weeks of protests against his 11-year rule and a military crackdown which has drawn international condemnation.
document.title: syria's assad grants amnesty as 5 killed in crackdown
lines_and_colors: syrian president bashar al-assad issued a general amnesty on tuesday, state television said, after ten weeks of protests against his 11-year rule and a military crackdown which has drawn international condemnation.
